name: pubsub-to-betterstack
description: Dataflow template to stream data from Pub/Sub to Better Stack

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub subscription
parameters.helpText: The name of the Pub/Sub subscription to read from

parameters.name: better_stack_source_token
parameters.label: Better Stack Source Token
parameters.helpText: The source token of your telemetry source in Better Stack

parameters.name: better_stack_ingesting_host
parameters.label: Better Stack Ingesting Host
parameters.helpText: The ingesting host of your telemetry source in Better Stack

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.label: Batch Size
parameters.helpText: Number of messages to batch before sending to Better Stack

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.label: Window Size
parameters.helpText: Window size in seconds for batching messages
